MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:58pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.57PM on 1st December 2020.
